Title: Relates to first responders coming into contact with saliva by spitting, throwing, tossing, or expelling from or by an individual
Summary: Relates to first responders coming into contact with saliva by spitting, throwing, tossing, or expelling from or by an individual or incarcerated individual.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to first responders coming into contact with saliva by spitting, throwing, tossing or expelling from or by an individual
